00043         public Directory(string Query,string UserName, string Password, string Path)
00044         {
00045             try
00046             {
00047                 Entry = new DirectoryEntry(Path, UserName, Password, AuthenticationTypes.Secure);
00048                 this.Path = Path;
00049                 this.UserName = UserName;
00050                 this.Password = Password;
00051                 this.Query = Query;
00052                 Searcher = new DirectorySearcher(Entry);
00053                 Searcher.Filter = Query;
00054                 Searcher.PageSize = 1000;
00055             }
00056             catch { throw; }
00057         }
00058         #endregion
00059

00066         public Entry FindUserByUserName(string UserName)
00067         {
00068             try
00069             {
00070                 List<Entry> Entries = FindUsers("samAccountName=" + UserName);
00071                 if (Entries.Count > 0)
00072                 {
00073                     return Entries[0];
00074                 }
00075                 return null;
00076             }
00077             catch { throw; }
00078         }
00079 
00086         public List<Entry> FindActiveUsers(string Filter, params object[] args)
00087         {
00088             try
00089             {
00090                 Filter = string.Format(Filter, args);
00091                 Filter = string.Format("(&((userAccountControl:1.2.840.113556.1.4.803:=512)(!(userAccountControl:1.2.840.113556.1.4.803:=2))(!(cn=*$)))({0}))", Filter);
00092                 return FindUsers(Filter);
00093             }
00094             catch { throw; }
00095         }
00096 
00103         public List<Entry> FindUsers(string Filter, params object[] args)
00104         {
00105             try
00106             {
00107                 Filter = string.Format(Filter, args);
00108                 Filter = string.Format("(&(objectClass=User)(objectCategory=Person)({0}))", Filter);
00109                 Searcher.Filter = Filter;
00110                 return FindAll();
00111             }
00112             catch { throw; }
00113         }
00114

00126                 Filter = string.Format("(&(objectClass=computer)({0}))", Filter);
00127                 Searcher.Filter = Filter;
00128                 return FindAll();

00130             catch { throw; }
00131         }

00156         public List<Entry> FindUsersAndGroups(string Filter, params object[] args)
00157         {
00158             try
00159             {
00160                 Filter = string.Format(Filter, args);
00161                 Filter = string.Format("(&(|(&(objectClass=Group)(objectCategory=Group))(&(objectClass=User)(objectCategory=Person)))({0}))", Filter);
00162                 Searcher.Filter = Filter;
00163                 return FindAll();
00164             }
00165             catch { throw; }
00166         }

00191         public List<Entry> FindGroups(string Filter, params object[] args)
00192         {
00193             try
00194             {
00195                 Filter = string.Format(Filter, args);
00196                 Filter = string.Format("(&(objectClass=Group)(objectCategory=Group)({0}))", Filter);

00208         public List<Utilities.LDAP.Entry> FindActiveGroupMembers(string GroupName)
00209         {
00210             try
00211             {
00212                 List<Utilities.LDAP.Entry> Entries = this.FindGroups("cn=" + GroupName);
00213                 if (Entries.Count < 1)
00214                     return new List<Utilities.LDAP.Entry>();
00215 
00216                 return this.FindActiveUsersAndGroups("memberOf=" + Entries[0].DistinguishedName);
00217             }
00218             catch
00219             {
00220                 return new List<Utilities.LDAP.Entry>();
00221             }
00222         }
00223 
00228         public List<Entry> FindAll()
00229         {
00230             try
00231             {
00232                 List<Entry> ReturnedResults = new List<Entry>();
00233                 SearchResultCollection Results = Searcher.FindAll();
00234                 foreach (SearchResult Result in Results)
00235                 {
00236                     ReturnedResults.Add(new Entry(Result.GetDirectoryEntry()));
00237                 }
00238                 Results.Dispose();
00239                 return ReturnedResults;
00240             }
00241             catch { throw; }
00242         }
00243 
00248         public Entry FindOne()
00249         {
00250             try
00251             {
00252                 SearchResult Result = Searcher.FindOne();
00253                 return new Entry(Result.GetDirectoryEntry());
00254             }
00255             catch { throw; }
00256         }

00274         public bool Authenticate()
00275         {
00276             try
00277             {
00278                 if (!Entry.Guid.ToString().ToLower().Trim().Equals(""))
00279                 {
00280                     return true;
00281                 }
00282             }
00283             catch
00284             {
00285             }
00286             return false;
00287         }

00294         public string Path
00295         {
00296             get { return _Path; }
00297             set
00298             {
00299                 _Path = value;
00300                 try
00301                 {
00302                     if (Entry != null)
00303                     {
00304                         Entry.Close();
00305                     }
00306                     Entry = new DirectoryEntry(_Path, _UserName, _Password, AuthenticationTypes.Secure);
00307                     Searcher = new DirectorySearcher(Entry);
00308                     Searcher.Filter = Query;
00309                     Searcher.PageSize = 1000;
00310                 }
00311                 catch { throw; }
00312             }
00313         }

00380         {

00403         public void Dispose()
00404         {
00405             if (Entry != null)
00406             {
00407                 Entry.Dispose();
00408                 Entry = null;
00409             }
00410             if (Searcher != null)
00411             {
00412                 Searcher.Dispose();
00413                 Searcher = null;
00414             }
00415         }
